src: till he cast bells, steeple, church, and parish up again. but if the good king simonides
which welcome we'll accept, feast here awhile, until our stars that frown lend us a smile.
trg: here have you seen a mighty king his child, i wis, to incest bring,

src: could not see to garter his hose, and you, being in love, cannot see to put on your hose.
trg: belike, boy, then, you are in love, for last morning you could not see to wipe my shoes.

src: i weigh my friend's affection with mine own, i'll tell you true. i'll call to you.
imagine i have said farewell already.
